review.title: “Experience prepress workers seeking high stress level job at fair pay.”
review.pros: Pros – This is one of the many competitive commercial printers centrally located in the Houston area. The pay is considerably fair. This is an extremely competitive work environment. The latest in digital technology and advanced high tech equipment is feasible.This is a very competitive and fast-paced field. Must be fluent in macintosh and PC platform.Highly skilled with Indesign software and Quark.
review.cons: Cons – This is a high level stress environment. Errorsare very costly and can lead to immediate termination.Many errors remain steady, due to poor management - little room for advancement.Raises are not probable. Positions are very scarce. Unpredictable hours.No room for growth or advancement. Repetitious work load. Male dominated environment, which can be good or bad, depending on your ideal work environment.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Senior Management should be aware of this high stress environment AND should expect to be more open with its employees on all work related issues considering the overwhelming time crunch and rush of incoming orders.
